ComicInfo.Title: This Charming Man
ComicInfo.Summary: It's a shock ending you won't see coming! Guest star Batman grudgingly helps Andrew fight the Queen of Blood, who has taken over Gotham City with her army of vampires! But Mary's going to lose something dear to her in the process! Come see why the Internet is raving about this great new series that mixes Super Heroes and horror!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 05:04:30. [CVDB316565] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 00:48:21. [Issue ID 922451]
